name: KingCraft - Fruit Candy Island
description:
Join millions of puzzle adventure lovers and play KingCraft, an addictive puzzle game blast for adults, our fun match puzzle game!

Slide rows & columns to match gems and candies to win levels. Conquer the island and every land to harvest vegetables, chocolate and even gems! Will you become the king of your own castle and blast candies!?

Enjoy this addictive puzzle adventure game! Join the match-3 mania for FREE! Smash fruit, match 3 gummies, slide chocolate and swap gems to win!


FEATURES

THE BEST MATCHING GAMES
Swap candies to complete every relaxing but challenging level. Conquer every land and harvest fruits, vegetables, chocolate, sugar or gems!

THOUSANDS OF LEVELS
Play in 10 different islands and conquer the crown! Get the highest score in every level!

GAME FOR ALL THE FAMILY
KingCraft - puzzle adventure island is an easy to play matching game for adults! No matter your age or experience, you will enjoy those wonderful candy games & levels!

CREATE YOUR FARM AND HARVEST
Vegetables, fruits, chocolate, gems, diamonds… Produce different blocks and candies and win gold coins selling them!

COOL GRAPHICS AND SOUNDS
Candies are more real than ever! Explore every island and create a colorful garden full of vegetables and candies to match!

SWEET BOOSTERS TO HELP YOU
Solve every puzzle using boosters! They will help you to match every block, chocolate or jelly. Blast every piece in this sweet candy game!

FUN MATCH 3 PUZZLE GAME BLAST
KingCraft - Fruit candy island is a stress relief game! NO TIME LIMITS, great power ups and relaxing levels. Are you ready to join the puzzle adventure?

PLAY WITH FRIENDS!
Can you beat your friends’ high score? Combine candies and complete every level in just a few movements to get a great record!


Are you ready to join the puzzle fever? Try the best matching games!

Download KingCraft - Fruit candy island for FREE and blast fruit, smash sugar, crush chocolate and make powerful combos! Yummy candies are waiting for you.

You will enjoy KingCraft if you love stress relief puzzles games! Smash sugar and blast puzzles to conquer island
